Effective Programming

Some friends and I have started up a new podcast at Effective Programming. We're a group of iOS developers who love exploring the platform, new technical challenges, agile software development, and the latest trend in test driven developmentยน.

Episode 1 - TDD in the Balance

Episode 1 was a healthy discussion of the pros and cons of TDD.

Episode 2 - iOS Eventing Frameworks

Episode 2 was about iOS communication patterns where we discussed 6 techniques of eventing in iOS while following along with a project that I wrote to heed the discussion.

We would love it if you would check us out, subscribe on iTunes, and give us a rating! Let us know what you think on twitter at @effprog!
